description.narrative: Faber Industrie S.p.A.(Faber) of Italy, a leader in the production of seamless steel and composite cylinders for the storage of high-pressure gases, has established Chalybs Cylinders Ltd. to build a plant in the Eastern Seaboard Industrial Estate, to manufacture seamless gas cylinders (the Project).

Technology transfer: As a leading producer of seamless cylinders for the storage of high-pressure gases, Faber uses state-of-the-art technologies and efficient processes, which will be installed in Thailand. Local staff will be trained to a new, highly competitive standard in manufacturing processes and management. While most gas tanks are made with welded cylinders, Faber produces seamless cylinders using precision technology that empties out a steel profile into a shell and seals it into a tank shape. Faber has developed its own safety control processes. Climate change: Compared with traditional vehicles, compressed natural gas (CNG) vehicles provide for reductions in carbon monoxide emissions of 90% to 97%, and in carbon dioxide emissions of about 20%. Other environmental benefits: Combustion of natural gas rather than gasoline in vehicles results in reduced emissions of toxic and carcinogenic compounds and virtually eliminates particulate emissions. Import substitution/improved access to CNG vehicles: Currently automotive plants in Thailand import high-quality, seamless cylinder parts that are not locally available. The Project''s production will lead to import substitution and contribute to the country''s economic growth. Improved access to CNG vehicles will translate into higher incomes for micro, small and medium enterprises and taxi operators, based on lower operating cost of CNG vehicles, which will contribute to inclusive growth. Job creation: The Project is expected to create direct and indirect jobs in Thailand.

mailing-address.narrative: Faber Industrie S.p.A. Via dell Industria 23 33043 Cividale del Friuli Italy Chalybs Cylinders Ltd. 23rd Floor, M Thai Tower All Seasons Plaza Place 87 Wireless Road Lumpini, Phatumwan Bangkok, 10330 Thailand

name.narrative: The Project is located in the Eastern Seaboard Industrial Estate, Thailand.
